title: Magnificent restored and renovated antique villa - LIP 005
details:
LIP-005 This magnificent restored and renovated antique villa located 10 minutes inland from Habaraduwa and Meepe beaches and 20 minutes from the Unesco Heritage site, Galle Fort, is waiting to be viewed.

The main entrance to the villa leads you along a large lilypond to the open living room, dining and study area which all overlook the beautiful tropical garden and large swimming pool. A modern and well-equipped kitchen is situated alongside the lounge with two double bedrooms with private bathrooms all situated on the ground floor. There are two further well-appointed bedrooms with private bathroom on the first floor.

The 1,250 m² property is fully walled with a CCTV system in place ensuring full protection and security.  The surrounding area has many foreign owned villas.  The deeds of the Villa are 100% clear and the property is owned by a Sri Lanka local company, which can be sold as a whole.  The property sale is inclusive of all furniture, fittings and fixtures.
